00147                               ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_MIN_COOL_SETPOINT_LIMIT_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_MAX_COOL_SETPOINT_LIMIT_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID), \

00195 #define THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00196 { \
00197    .id = THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00198    .options = { \
00199                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00200                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00201               }, \
00202    .attributesAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00203    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00204    .commandsAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00205    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00206 }
00207 
00208 #define THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00209 { \
00210    .id = THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00211    .options = { \
00212                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00213                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00214               }, \
00215    .attributesAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00216    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00217    .commandsAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00218    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00219 }
00220 
00221 #define DEFINE_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00222     THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00223 
00224 #define THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00225 { \
00226    .id = THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00227    .options = { \
00228                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00229                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00230               }, \
00231    .attributesAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00232    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00233    .commandsAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00234    .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00235 }
00236 
00237 #define THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00238 { \
00239    .id = THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00240    .options = { \
00241                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00242                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00243               }, \
00244    .attributesAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00245    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00246    .commandsAmount = ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00247    .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00248 }
00249 
00250 #define DEFINE_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_FLASH(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00251     THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_##cltype##_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)

00369 
00370 BEGIN_PACK
00371 
00372 /***************************************************************************/
00375 typedef struct PACK
00376 {
00377   int8_t mode;
00378   int8_t amount;
00379 } ZCL_SetpointRaiseLower_t;
00380 
00381 /***************************************************************************/
00385 typedef struct PACK
00386 {
00387   struct PACK
00388   {
00389     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00390     uint8_t type;
00391     uint8_t properties;
00392     uint16_t value;
00393   } clusterVersion;
00394 
00395   struct PACK
00396   {
00397     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00398     uint8_t type;
00399     uint8_t properties;
00400     int16_t value;
00401     ZCL_ReportTime_t reportCounter;     
00402     ZCL_ReportTime_t minReportInterval; 
00403     ZCL_ReportTime_t maxReportInterval; 
00404     int16_t reportableChange;           
00405     ZCL_ReportTime_t timeoutPeriod;     
00406     int16_t lastReportedValue;          
00407     int16_t minVal;
00408     int16_t maxVal;
00409   } localTemperature;                  
00410 #ifdef ZCL_THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_INCLUDE_OPTIONAL_ATTRIBUTES
00411   struct PACK
00412   {

00739   {

00743   } setpointCommand;
